title: Hello! I am Patricia Gracia
description: I am an aspiring front-end developer transitioning from a background as a self-employed psychologist. During my time as a therapist, I developed crucial skills such as problem-solving, efficient time management, and meticulous attention to detail. I am excited to bring these skills to my new passion for front-end development, creating projects that are both functional and visually appealing.
factsTitle: Quick random facts to get to know me better:
facts: I've never imagined myself loving to code, but here I am!
I practice calisthenics (my current goal is to do a muscle-up).
My hometown is Zaragoza, but I currently live in Menorca. I also have lived in Madrid and Nottingham.
I really (like, REALLY) enjoy specialty coffee.
